song.title: Deep down in my heart
song.subtitle: Jesus, I love you deep down in my heart
song.text:
# Jesus, I love you deep down in my heart, Jesus, I love you deep down in my heart. (2x)
* (Männer) We talk about: (Frauen) deep, deep, down, down, deep down in my heart. (Männer) We talk about: (Frauen) deep, deep, down, down, deep down in my heart. (2x)
# Jesus, I need you deep down in my heart, Jesus, I love you deep down in my heart. (2x)
# Jesus, I praise you deep down in my heart, Jesus, I love you deep down in my heart.
